RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Bachelor's in Mathematics from Instituto Superior de Ciencias, Letras e Artes de Trs Coraes (1976), Master's in Meteorology from Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (1982), PhD in Meteorology from University of Reading (2001) and Post-doctorate in remote sensing of atmosphere at University of Geneva (2013). Has experience in Geosciences, acting on the following subjects: atmospheric and solar radiation modeling, absorption of radiation by water vapor, radiative processes in atmospheric models, planetary boundary layer and laser remote sensing of atmosphere.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduado at Matematica pelo Instituto Superior de Ciencias, Letras e Artes de Tres Coracoes (1976), mestre em Meteorologia pelo Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (1982), PhD em Meteorologia pela University of Reading (2001) e ps-doutor em sensoriamento remoto da atmosfera na Universit de Genve (2013). Tem experincia em Geocincias, atuando nos seguintes assuntos: radiacao atmosferica, radiacao solar, vapor de agua, processos radiativos em GCMs, camada limite planetaria e sensoriamento remoto da atmosfera.
